summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List , and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Department of Health and Human Services outlines 45 open recommendations that it should prioritize. For example, HHS should identify how it will increase U.S. production of medical supplies to help ease future global...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Health and Human Services
